root.name: day()

example.code: def setup(): PFont metaBold metaBold = loadFont("fonts/Meta-Bold.vlw.gz") setFont(metaBold, 44) noLoop() def draw(): d = day()# Values from 1 - 31 m = month()# Values from 1 - 12 y = year()# 2003, 2004, 2005, etc. s = String.valueOf(d) text(s, 10, 28) s = String.valueOf(m) text(s, 10, 56) s = String.valueOf(y) text(s, 10, 84)

root.description: Processing communicates with the clock on your computer. The day() function returns the current day as a value from 1 - 31.
